rules.name: Component missing GUID
rules.description: Components should have a Guid attribute. Use Guid="*" for auto-generation.

rules.name: Component has multiple files
rules.description: Components with multiple files may cause repair issues. Consider one file per component.

rules.name: Component has no KeyPath
rules.description: Components should have a KeyPath specified for proper installation tracking.

rules.name: Component Id should match File Id
rules.description: For single-file components, the Component Id should match the File Id for clarity.

rules.name: Component spans multiple directories
rules.description: ICE57: Component installs to multiple directories. Split into separate components.

rules.name: Permanent component without GUID
rules.description: ICE92: Permanent components require a stable GUID for reference counting.

rules.name: Mixed per-user and per-machine data
rules.description: ICE57: Component mixes HKLM/HKCU registry or per-user/machine paths.

rules.name: Duplicate file in multiple components
rules.description: ICE30: Same file path appears in multiple components causing conflicts.

rules.name: User profile component without HKCU KeyPath
rules.description: ICE38: Components in user profile should use HKCU registry as KeyPath.

rules.name: Orphaned component
rules.description: Component is not referenced by any feature.

rules.name: Component directory invalid
rules.description: Component references a directory that doesn't exist.

rules.name: Empty component
rules.description: Component has no files, registry, or other resources.

rules.name: 64-bit component in 32-bit package
rules.description: 64-bit component may not work in 32-bit installer package.

rules.name: Component Id too long
rules.description: Component Id exceeds 72 character limit.

rules.name: Transitive component condition
rules.description: Component condition references another component causing dependencies.

rules.name: File missing Source attribute
rules.description: File elements must have a Source attribute pointing to the source file.

rules.name: File Id contains invalid characters
rules.description: File Ids should only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and periods.

rules.name: Long file name detected
rules.description: File names longer than 8.3 format may cause issues on older systems.

rules.name: File source not found
rules.description: The source file specified does not exist.

rules.name: File has no version
rules.description: Versioned files without version info may cause repair issues.

rules.name: Duplicate file Id
rules.description: Multiple files share the same Id causing conflicts.

rules.name: Assembly file missing manifest
rules.description: Win32 assembly files should have accompanying manifest.

rules.name: DLL without version info
rules.description: DLL files should have embedded version information.

rules.name: File name contains invalid characters
rules.description: File name contains characters not allowed in file names.

rules.name: File path too long
rules.description: Full installation path may exceed Windows MAX_PATH limit.

rules.name: Executable without checksum
rules.description: Executable files should have checksum for verification.

rules.name: Font file not in fonts folder
rules.description: Font files should be installed to the Fonts folder.

rules.name: Large file detected
rules.description: Very large files may increase installation time significantly.

rules.name: PDB file included in release
rules.description: Debug symbol files should not be included in release builds.

rules.name: Temporary file included
rules.description: File appears to be a temporary file that shouldn't be deployed.

rules.name: Directory missing Name attribute
rules.description: Directory elements should have a Name attribute unless referencing standard directories.

rules.name: Hardcoded directory path
rules.description: Avoid hardcoded paths. Use standard directories or properties instead.

rules.name: Deep directory nesting
rules.description: Deep directory nesting (>5 levels) may cause installation issues.

rules.name: Directory Id too long
rules.description: Directory Id exceeds 72 character limit.

rules.name: Circular directory reference
rules.description: Directory references itself through parent chain.

rules.name: Directory name has spaces
rules.description: Directory names with spaces may cause issues in some scenarios.

rules.name: Non-standard installation directory
rules.description: Installation to non-standard location may confuse users.

rules.name: Empty directory not created
rules.description: Empty directories need CreateFolder element to be created.

rules.name: Invalid standard directory reference
rules.description: Referenced standard directory ID is not recognized.

rules.name: Directory removed on uninstall only
rules.description: Directory will only be removed during uninstall, not repair.

rules.name: Feature missing Title
rules.description: Features should have a Title attribute for display in the UI.

rules.name: Feature has no components
rules.description: Features should contain at least one ComponentRef or ComponentGroupRef.

rules.name: Feature Level is zero
rules.description: Feature Level="0" means the feature won't be installed by default.

rules.name: Feature Id too long
rules.description: Feature Id exceeds 38 character limit.

rules.name: Circular feature reference
rules.description: Feature references itself through parent chain.

rules.name: Feature tree too deep
rules.description: Feature hierarchy exceeds recommended 16 levels.

rules.name: Too many features
rules.description: Package has >32000 features which may cause issues.

rules.name: Feature missing Description
rules.description: Features should have Description for better UI experience.

rules.name: Hidden feature with components
rules.description: Hidden feature (Level=0) contains components that won't be installed.

rules.name: Root feature absent
rules.description: At least one top-level feature should exist.

rules.name: Property name should be uppercase
rules.description: Public properties should be UPPERCASE. Private properties should be lowercase.

rules.name: Property overrides built-in property
rules.description: This property name conflicts with a built-in Windows Installer property.

rules.name: Secure property not marked
rules.description: Properties passed to deferred custom actions should be in SecureCustomProperties.

rules.name: Property value too long
rules.description: Property values exceeding 255 characters may be truncated.

rules.name: Property not used
rules.description: Defined property is never referenced in conditions or actions.

rules.name: Property Id invalid
rules.description: Property Id contains invalid characters.

rules.name: Restricted property modified
rules.description: Modifying restricted properties may cause unexpected behavior.

rules.name: Property Admin value different
rules.description: Property has different value for Admin property.

rules.name: Property may contain sensitive data
rules.description: Property name suggests it contains passwords or keys.

rules.name: Property used in condition not defined
rules.description: Condition references property that is not defined.

rules.name: Custom action should be deferred
rules.description: Custom actions that modify system state should run deferred in system context.

rules.name: Custom action missing Execute attribute
rules.description: Custom actions should specify their execution mode (immediate/deferred).

rules.name: Custom action has no rollback
rules.description: Deferred custom actions should have corresponding rollback actions.

rules.name: VBScript/JScript custom action detected
rules.description: Script custom actions are slower and less reliable than native DLL actions.

rules.name: Custom action DLL entry missing
rules.description: DLL custom action must specify entry point function.

rules.name: Custom action Impersonate with deferred
rules.description: Deferred Impersonate=yes runs as installing user, not SYSTEM.

rules.name: Custom action binary missing
rules.description: Custom action references binary that is not defined.

rules.name: Custom action not scheduled
rules.description: Custom action is defined but not added to any sequence.

rules.name: Type 1 CA before InstallFiles
rules.description: Type 1 custom action runs before files are installed.

rules.name: Custom action returns wrong type
rules.description: Custom action return type should be UINT for MSI.

rules.name: Async custom action
rules.description: Async custom actions (Continue=yes) may cause timing issues.

rules.name: Custom action in wrong sequence
rules.description: Custom action placed in inappropriate sequence table.

rules.name: Property custom action missing value
rules.description: Type 51 custom action must set property value.

rules.name: Deferred CA reads session property
rules.description: Deferred custom actions cannot read session properties directly.

rules.name: PowerShell custom action
rules.description: Consider native custom action for better performance.

rules.name: Writing to HKLM requires elevation
rules.description: Registry writes to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE require administrator privileges.

rules.name: Registry key missing Root attribute
rules.description: Registry elements must specify a Root (HKLM, HKCU, etc.).

rules.name: Per-user registry in per-machine install
rules.description: HKCU registry entries in per-machine installs only affect the installing user.

rules.name: Registry key path too long
rules.description: Registry key path exceeds maximum length.

rules.name: Registry value name has backslash
rules.description: Backslash in value name may indicate incorrect key path.

rules.name: HKCR shorthand used
rules.description: HKCR writes go to different locations per-user vs per-machine.

rules.name: Registry REG_EXPAND_SZ without variables
rules.description: ExpandString type used but value contains no environment variables.

rules.name: Registry value overwrites existing
rules.description: ForceCreateOnInstall may overwrite user customizations.

rules.name: Invalid registry value type
rules.description: Registry Type attribute has invalid value.

rules.name: Registry in system-protected location
rules.description: Writing to system-protected registry locations may fail.

rules.name: Service missing required attributes
rules.description: ServiceInstall requires Name, Start, ErrorControl, and Type attributes.

rules.name: Service has no ServiceControl
rules.description: Services should have ServiceControl elements to manage start/stop.

rules.name: Service starts before files installed
rules.description: Service start should be sequenced after InstallFiles.

rules.name: Service account LocalSystem
rules.description: LocalSystem has high privileges; consider LocalService or NetworkService.

rules.name: Service missing executable
rules.description: Service references component without executable file.

rules.name: Service no description
rules.description: Services should have Description for Services control panel.

rules.name: Service dependencies circular
rules.description: Service dependencies create circular reference.

rules.name: Service auto-start without recovery
rules.description: Auto-start services should have failure recovery options.

rules.name: Service hardcoded account
rules.description: Hardcoded service account may not exist on target machine.

rules.name: Interactive service deprecated
rules.description: Interactive services are deprecated in modern Windows.

rules.name: Shortcut missing Target
rules.description: Shortcuts must specify a Target file or directory.

rules.name: Shortcut path not standard
rules.description: Shortcut in non-standard location may not be found by users.

rules.name: Shortcut has no icon
rules.description: Shortcuts should have an icon for better user experience.

rules.name: Shortcut working directory invalid
rules.description: WorkingDirectory references invalid directory.

rules.name: Shortcut arguments in Target
rules.description: Use Arguments attribute instead of embedding in Target.

rules.name: Advertised shortcut in per-user
rules.description: Advertised shortcuts work differently per-user vs per-machine.

rules.name: Multiple shortcuts to same target
rules.description: Multiple shortcuts point to the same executable.

rules.name: Shortcut name contains invalid chars
rules.description: Shortcut name contains characters invalid in file names.

rules.name: Desktop shortcut always created
rules.description: Consider making desktop shortcuts optional via feature.

rules.name: URL shortcut missing icon
rules.description: Internet shortcuts should specify icon for display.

rules.name: Bundle missing UpgradeCode
rules.description: Bundles must have an UpgradeCode for proper upgrade detection.

rules.name: Bundle has no packages
rules.description: Bundle Chain must contain at least one package.

rules.name: Bundle package missing DetectCondition
rules.description: Packages should have DetectCondition for proper upgrade detection.

rules.name: Bundle variable shadows builtin
rules.description: Variable name conflicts with built-in Burn variable.

rules.name: Bundle package Vital=no
rules.description: Non-vital package failures may go unnoticed.

rules.name: Bundle payload not found
rules.description: Referenced payload file does not exist.

rules.name: Bundle DownloadUrl without hash
rules.description: Remote payloads should have hash for verification.

rules.name: Bundle RollbackBoundary placement
rules.description: RollbackBoundary may cause unexpected rollback behavior.

rules.name: Bundle ExePackage missing RepairCommand
rules.description: ExePackage should specify RepairCommand for repair scenarios.

rules.name: Bundle MsiPackage silent
rules.description: MsiPackage should support silent installation for bundle scenarios.

rules.name: Bundle MsuPackage no KB
rules.description: MsuPackage should include KB number for identification.

rules.name: Bundle PackageGroup circular
rules.description: PackageGroup references create circular dependency.

rules.name: Package missing UpgradeCode
rules.description: Packages must have an UpgradeCode for proper upgrade handling.

rules.name: Package has no MajorUpgrade
rules.description: Packages should include MajorUpgrade element for upgrade handling.

rules.name: Package version not semantic
rules.description: Package versions should follow semantic versioning (major.minor.build).

rules.name: ProductCode is hardcoded
rules.description: ProductCode should use * for auto-generation or use unique GUIDs per release.

rules.name: Package missing Manufacturer
rules.description: Manufacturer attribute is required for proper Add/Remove Programs display.

rules.name: Package missing ProductName
rules.description: ProductName should be set for user-friendly identification.

rules.name: Package InstallerVersion too low
rules.description: InstallerVersion should be 500 for WiX v4 features.

rules.name: Package Compressed=no
rules.description: Uncompressed packages increase download size.

rules.name: Package Language missing
rules.description: ProductLanguage should be set for localization support.

rules.name: Package GUID invalid format
rules.description: GUID format is invalid. Use uppercase with hyphens.

rules.name: Package same UpgradeCode and ProductCode
rules.description: UpgradeCode and ProductCode should be different.

rules.name: Package version fourth field used
rules.description: Windows Installer ignores version fourth field.

rules.name: Package InstallScope per-user
rules.description: Per-user installs don't require elevation but have limitations.

rules.name: Package no Codepage
rules.description: Codepage should be specified for non-ASCII characters.

rules.name: Package AdminImage true
rules.description: AdminImage=yes creates admin install point, not user install.

rules.name: Custom UI with no error handling
rules.description: Custom UI should include error dialog handling.

rules.name: Missing license agreement
rules.description: Installation UI should include license agreement when required.

rules.name: Dialog control overlap
rules.description: Dialog controls overlap and may hide each other.

rules.name: Dialog no cancel button
rules.description: Dialogs should have a way for users to cancel.

rules.name: Text truncated in control
rules.description: Control too small for text content.

rules.name: Dialog action invalid
rules.description: Dialog action references non-existent dialog.

rules.name: Bitmap file missing
rules.description: UI references bitmap file that doesn't exist.

rules.name: Large bitmap in UI
rules.description: Large bitmaps increase package size significantly.

rules.name: UIRef without UI elements
rules.description: UIRef requires corresponding UI elements to be defined.

rules.name: Progress text missing
rules.description: ActionText should be defined for progress dialog.

rules.name: Installing to ProgramFiles without elevation
rules.description: Installing to Program Files typically requires administrator privileges.

rules.name: World-writable permissions detected
rules.description: Avoid granting write permissions to Everyone on installed files.

rules.name: Custom action runs with elevated privileges
rules.description: Elevated custom actions should validate input to prevent privilege escalation.

rules.name: Hardcoded credentials in Property
rules.description: Properties containing passwords should not be hardcoded.

rules.name: DLL search order vulnerability
rules.description: Custom action DLL path may be subject to DLL hijacking.

rules.name: Insecure download URL
rules.description: Download URLs should use HTTPS for security.

rules.name: Registry ACL too permissive
rules.description: Registry key permissions allow too much access.

rules.name: Service account has admin rights
rules.description: Service account should have minimal necessary privileges.

rules.name: Firewall rule too broad
rules.description: Firewall exception allows too many connections.

rules.name: Binary not signed
rules.description: Binary files should be digitally signed.

rules.name: Script execution enabled
rules.description: Script custom actions may be blocked by security policies.

rules.name: ProgramData writable
rules.description: ProgramData should not be world-writable.

rules.name: Large number of components
rules.description: Packages with >1000 components may have slower installation.

rules.name: Embedded cabinet is very large
rules.description: Very large embedded cabinets (>100MB) may cause memory issues.

rules.name: Multiple files per component
rules.description: One file per component improves patching and repair efficiency.

rules.name: Uncompressed cabinet
rules.description: Uncompressed cabinets are faster but larger.

rules.name: Many custom actions
rules.description: Large number of custom actions may slow installation.

rules.name: Sync custom action in UI sequence
rules.description: Synchronous custom actions in UI sequence freeze the UI.

rules.name: Deep feature tree
rules.description: Deep feature hierarchies slow costing calculations.

rules.name: Large binary table
rules.description: Large Binary table entries increase package size.

rules.name: Deprecated element used
rules.description: This element is deprecated in WiX v4. Use the recommended alternative.

rules.name: Deprecated attribute used
rules.description: This attribute is deprecated in WiX v4. Use the recommended alternative.

rules.name: WiX v3 syntax detected
rules.description: File uses WiX v3 schema. Consider migrating to v4.

rules.name: Deprecated namespace
rules.description: Extension namespace has changed in WiX v4.

rules.name: Legacy Product element
rules.description: Consider using Package element for WiX v4 style.

rules.name: Deprecated directory reference
rules.description: Use StandardDirectory instead of DirectoryRef for standard locations.

rules.name: Upgrade removes newer version
rules.description: MajorUpgrade may remove newer versions. Check version range.

rules.name: No downgrade prevention
rules.description: Consider preventing downgrades to avoid data loss.

rules.name: Upgrade version gap
rules.description: Gap in upgrade version range may leave orphan installations.

rules.name: Upgrade schedule late
rules.description: Late upgrade schedule may leave old files.

rules.name: Small update without version bump
rules.description: Small updates should increment build number.

rules.name: UpgradeCode changed
rules.description: Changing UpgradeCode breaks upgrade path.

rules.name: IIS WebSite without bindings
rules.description: IIS WebSite should have at least one binding.

rules.name: IIS AppPool identity
rules.description: ApplicationPoolIdentity is recommended over custom accounts.

rules.name: SQL Database no rollback
rules.description: SQL operations should have rollback scripts.

rules.name: Util User domain account
rules.description: Domain user accounts may not exist on target.

rules.name: NetFx version unavailable
rules.description: .NET version may not be available on target.

rules.name: Firewall rule protocol missing
rules.description: Firewall rule should specify protocol.

rules.name: XML file transformation
rules.description: XmlFile changes require careful testing.

rules.name: Environment variable PATH modify
rules.description: PATH modifications should use proper delimiters.

rules.name: Inconsistent Id naming
rules.description: Id naming conventions are inconsistent across elements.

rules.name: Reserved word used as Id
rules.description: Id uses a reserved Windows Installer word.

rules.name: Non-descriptive Id
rules.description: Generated or non-descriptive Id makes maintenance harder.

rules.name: Id starts with number
rules.description: Ids should start with letter for compatibility.

rules.name: Mixed case in Id
rules.description: Consider consistent casing for Ids.

rules.name: Hardcoded string in UI
rules.description: UI strings should use localization variables.

rules.name: Missing translation
rules.description: Localization variable missing for some cultures.

rules.name: String Id inconsistent
rules.description: Localization string Id doesn't match pattern.

rules.name: Unused localization string
rules.description: Localization string is defined but never used.
